Review_title: Interesting but loved the background music
Review_Text: Can anyone help me find the background music of this documentary. I was unable to read it from the credits and despite searching the Internet cannot find composition or musicians name?

Review_title: Could have been so much more
Review_Text: Boring docu about a fascinating figure. This docu is, as the name suggests, very centered on the the view from the louvre. Da Vinci was so much more however. His scientific ideas and accomplishments seem non existent. I can't help to wonder what Leonardo would think of this 'analysis' of his work and life, but i fear he would be quite disappointed. As I was. What's more, I don't feel inspired to travel to Paris and see what's there myself, which is sad. As six for effort and Leonardo. Please try again.
